scripts.dev: concurrently -n b,f -c cyan,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n b,f -c cyan,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run preview:frontend"
scripts.preview:frontend: cd web/frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
